# SRAudioLevel

**Class**

An object that represents the audio level for a range of speech.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRAudioLevel
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRAudioLevel/loudness] property to get the value of the audio level.

## Getting metrics

- **timeRange**: The time range in the audio stream that the level applies to.
- **loudness**: The measure of the audio level in decibels.

## Getting speech metrics and analytics

- **audioLevel**: The audio level of the speech.
- **speechRecognition**: The partial or final results of the speech recognition request.
- **soundClassification**: The highest-ranking classifications in the time range.
- **speechExpression**: The metrics and voice analytics for the range of speech.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
